definition: the front of a military formation or procession, remove the head of
details:
noun
- the front of a military formation or procession
= example: the front of a military formation or procession
- the source of water from which a stream arises
= example: the source of water from which a stream arises
= synonyms: fountainhead, headspring
- the part in the front or nearest the viewer
= synonyms: forefront
- the top of something
= example: the top of something
- the foam or froth that accumulates at the top when you pour an effervescent liquid into a container
= example: the foam or froth that accumulates at the top when you pour an effervescent liquid into a container
- a rounded compact mass
= example: a rounded compact mass
- a natural elevation (especially a rocky one that juts out into the sea)
= synonyms: foreland, promontory, headland
- a user of usually soft drugs
= example: a user of usually soft drugs
- a person who is in charge
= example: a person who is in charge
= synonyms: chief, top dog
- an individual person
= example: an individual person
- the educator who has executive authority for a school
= synonyms: principal, school principal, head teacher
- the pressure exerted by a fluid
= example: the pressure exerted by a fluid
- a dense cluster of flowers or foliage
= example: a dense cluster of flowers or foliage
= synonyms: capitulum
- the length or height based on the size of a human or animal head
= example: the length or height based on the size of a human or animal head
- the tip of an abscess (where the pus accumulates)
- oral stimulation of the genitals
= example: oral stimulation of the genitals
= synonyms: oral sex
- a single domestic animal
= example: a single domestic animal
- a membrane that is stretched taut over a drum
= synonyms: drumhead
- a projection out from one end
= example: a projection out from one end
- (nautical) a toilet on board a boat or ship
- the striking part of a tool
= example: the striking part of a tool
- (usually plural) the obverse side of a coin that usually bears the representation of a person's head
= example: (usually plural) the obverse side of a coin that usually bears the representation of a person's head
- (computer science) a tiny electromagnetic coil and metal pole used to write and read magnetic patterns on a disk
= synonyms: read/write head
- that part of a skeletal muscle that is away from the bone that it moves
- the upper part of the human body or the front part of the body in animals
= synonyms: caput
- the rounded end of a bone that fits into a rounded cavity in another bone to form a joint
= example: the rounded end of a bone that fits into a rounded cavity in another bone to form a joint
- that which is responsible for one's thoughts and feelings
= synonyms: brain, psyche, nous, mind
- (grammar) the word in a grammatical constituent that plays the same grammatical role as the whole constituent
= synonyms: head word
- a line of text serving to indicate what the passage below it is about
= example: a line of text serving to indicate what the passage below it is about
= synonyms: header
- the subject matter at issue
= synonyms: question
- a V-shaped mark at one end of an arrow pointer
= synonyms: point
- forward movement
= example: forward movement
= synonyms: headway
- a difficult juncture
= synonyms: pass
verb
- remove the head of
= example: remove the head of
- direct the course
= synonyms: maneuver
- to go or travel towards
= example: to go or travel towards
- travel in front of
= synonyms: lead
- be in charge of
= example: be in charge of
= synonyms: direct, lead
- form a head or come or grow to a head
= example: form a head or come or grow to a head
- be in the front of or on top of
= example: be in the front of or on top of
- be the first or leading member of (a group) and excel
= example: be the first or leading member of (a group) and excel
= synonyms: head up
- take its rise
= example: take its rise
